title: [Medicine] Lab-made cartilage gel outperforms natural cartilage: Researchers have created the 1st gel-based cartilage substitute that is even stronger and more durable. This hydrogel—a material made of water-absorbing polymers—can be pressed and pulled with more force & is 3 times more resistant to wear & tear

[Cancer] Breast cancer cells use force to open channels through tissue: Previously, researchers thought that cells use enzymes to dissolve membranes, but now it is understood that breast cancer cells use forces generated by the protrusions to open up channels within the membrane material
